name: 07-recipe-transforming-data-with-transform-pipe
description: In this example, we are going to create a transform stream using Node.js core **stream** module. The transform stream we will create, will convert all the text from our file to UPPERCASE.
author: Elom Atsou Agboka <opentech.consult@gmail.com> (https://github.com/OpenTechConsult)
